descriptionHtml:
Paladin\'s Weapons and Shields
Because everyone loves paladins!

2 swords: a claymore and a longsword with scabbard
2 shields: one of them has wings

Everything can be purchased from Eorlund, or it can be crafted with steel ingots and gold ingots (swords are found in the steel category, shields are found in the daedric category).

Everything can be improved at the grindstones (swords), workbenches (shields) and enchanted.

Blood layer on weapons included (adapted from vanilla, might be a bit stretched, let me know what you think).

I\'ll try to import the armors, but it\'s much more difficult and i might not succeed. So, please, 
don\'t ask for the armor since i\'m already trying.

UPDATE: fixed a bit a shield\'s mesh, it was clipping a bit, now it should be fine.

INSTALLATION:
Drop the Data folder in your Skyrim directory, then open the Skyrim launcher and click \"Data 
files\". Be sure that the Paladin.esp is checked, then activate \"load loose files\".

Credits:
Conversion from the Jerros and LHammonds Oblivion mod Lost \"Paladins of the Divines\" 
http://www.tesnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=10505
Thanks to Lazarus, An Untaken Name and EuGENIUS for the meshes and textures.
Thanks to Jaysus for the tutorial.
Thanks to Ghogiel for the continuos support.
Thanks to Waaaghbafet for some tips on the STAT values.
Thanks to Samutz in the Bethesda\'s forum for the smithing tutorial.
And to everyone in the Nexus forum.
author: Phate3
